video.title: Death Row Stories
video.synopsis: This documentary series puts the death penalty on trial, examining capital murder cases with questionable convictions -- and devastating consequences.

episodes.synopsis: Convicted of murdering an elderly woman, Edward Lee Elmore is sentenced to death, but a legal intern uncovers discrepancies pointing to his innocence.
episodes.title: Edward Lee Elmore

episodes.synopsis: Career criminals are charged with a brutal home invasion, but the wife of one culprit fingers a former law student with no criminal record.
episodes.title: Gloria Killian

episodes.synopsis: In the shortest death penalty trial in modern Ohio history, a man's plea of innocence goes unheard until a lawyer‐turned‐priest takes on his case.
episodes.title: Joe D'Ambrosio

episodes.synopsis: A convict who has spent 26 years on death row for the rape and murder of an 11‐year‐old girl vehemently maintains his innocence in a complex case.
episodes.title: James Duckett

episodes.synopsis: A robbery-murder suspect is convicted, but new evidence halts the imminent execution and sets the prisoner free.
episodes.title: John Thompson

episodes.synopsis: After a businessman spends nearly a decade on death row, a new explanation for the killings exposes drug trafficking and money-laundering operations.
episodes.title: Kris Maharaj

episodes.synopsis: Circumstantial evidence sends an Army sergeant to death row for the murder of an Army wife and her children, but the case takes an historic turn.
episodes.title: Timothy Hennis

episodes.synopsis: A man commits a hideous mass murder in Colorado. Two years later, his fate lies in the hands of the governor, whose decision ripples beyond death row.
episodes.title: Nathan Dunlap
